meanings.definition: A device that allows multiple people to participate in a phone call by broadcasting the conversation through a speaker.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, we used speakerphones to include everyone in the call.
meanings.sent2: The office conference room is equipped with speakerphones for group discussions.
meanings.sent3: The speakerphones made it seem like our boss was right in the room with us!
meanings.sent4: The speakerphones turned the room into a buzzing hive of voices.
meanings.sent5: The clarity of the speakerphones made every word crystal clear.

meanings.definition: The act of using a speakerphone to communicate with others during a phone call.
meanings.sent1: His speakerphones usage during calls annoyed his coworkers.
meanings.sent2: She prefers speakerphones for hands-free conversations.
meanings.sent3: The speakerphones usage in the quiet library startled everyone.
meanings.sent4: The speakerphones usage in the cafe echoed loudly.
meanings.sent5: The speakerphones usage made communication effortless.
